nodes.text: The family of the one-time Sith Lord Maul was made up of Dathomirian Zabraks from the Outer Rim planet Dathomir. Born to the Nightsister leader Mother Talzin, Maul was raised in the culture of the Nightbrothers, along with his brothers Savage Opress and Feral. Taken in by a Dark Lord of the Sith, Darth Sidious, as a child, Maul would not be reunited with his kin until the Clone Wars, in which he and Opress cut a path of destruction across the galaxy.

Talzin, a Dathomirian female, was the Mother of the Nightsister clan during the last years of the Republic Era. She gave birth to three sons named Maul, who was born in 54 BBY, Savage Opress, and Feral.

Talzin lived with two of her sons in a home on Dathomir. At some point, Darth Sidious traveled to their home planet. Talzin and Sidious traded secrets of the dark side of the Force.  Whenever Maul saw sidous talking to his mother in his house, he would hide in his room. Eventually, Sidious persuaded Talzin to give Maul to a keeper. Despite Talzin's hesitations, she sent him anyway. Sidious considered making Talzin his apprentice, but after seeing her son Maul use the Force to choke his keeper and his keeper's two sons, he took Maul instead.

Without knowledge of their brother Maul, the close brothers Savage and Feral lived in the Nightbrother village. When Asajj Ventress returned to Dathomir during the Clone Wars to recruit an assassin, Feral survived all three tests with the help of Savage. Savage was then chosen to be her assassin.
After undergoing a transformation, Savage was given the task to kill Feral to show his loyalty to Asajj. Savage did as he was told and killed Feral.

After returning to Dathomir, Savage learned from Talzin that he had another brother exiled on the planet Lotho Minor. After finding Maul, he brought him back to Dathomir, where Mother Talzin restored his mind and gave him new cybernetic legs. Maul then decided to take on Savage as his apprentice, and the two rampaged across the galaxy on a quest for revenge.

Following their failed takeover of the Ohnaka Gang, Savage and Maul were found by the Death Watch and struck an alliance with Pre Vizsla. They recruited the Black Sun, the Hutt Clan, and the Pyke Syndicate to create the Shadow Collective.

The Shadow Collective then assisted the Death Watch's takeover of Mandalore. Following the operation, Vizsla betrayed Maul and Savage, imprisoning them. After escaping, Maul and Savage sought to retake their seat of power. Maul challenged Vizsla for the throne, defeating and beheading him with his own darksaber. While some of the Death Watch submitted to Maul's victory, Bo-Katan Kryze led her forces in resistance, plunging Mandalore into civil war.
During the Battle of Sundari, Darth Sidious traveled to Mandalore to remove Maul from power. During a fierce lightsaber duel, Sidious impaled Savage Opress, killing him before capturing Maul.
During the Second Battle of Dathomir, General Grievous killed Mother Talzin, leaving Maul as the sole surviving member of his family.
During the Imperial Era, Maul traveled to Tatooine and engaged Obi-Wan Kenobi in a final lightsaber duel. Kenobi quickly killed Maul, ending his family line.
